title: User Authentication - Successful Login
description: Verify that a registered user can successfully log in with valid credentials using Supabase Auth.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Input valid registered email and password.
Click the login button.
Verify that the user is redirected to the dashboard page.
Verify that the authentication token is stored securely.

title: User Authentication - Invalid Login Attempt
description: Verify that login fails with incorrect credentials and appropriate error message is shown.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Input invalid or unregistered email and/or password.
Click the login button.
Verify that login is rejected and error message is displayed.

title: User Registration - Successful Signup
description: Verify that a new user can successfully create an account with valid data via Supabase signup flow.

steps.description: Navigate to the signup page.
Provide valid new user information (email, password, name).
Submit the signup form.
Verify account is created and user is redirected to onboarding or dashboard.
Verify confirmation email is sent if applicable.

title: Password Recovery - Forgot Password Flow
description: Verify that the user can successfully request password reset and complete reset using the emailed link.

steps.description: Navigate to the Forgot Password page.
Submit a registered email to request password reset.
Verify that a password reset email is sent.
Use the reset link from the email to open the Reset Password page.
Input a new valid password and confirm it.
Submit the new password.
Verify the password is updated and user can login with the new password.

title: Dashboard Financial - Real-Time Alerts Display
description: Verify that financial dashboard correctly displays real-time alerts for accounts payable and receivable.

steps.description: Login and navigate to the financial dashboard.
Verify display of accounts summary with accurate figures.
Verify real-time alerts appear dynamically as financial data changes.
Trigger simulated due payment alert and verify it's shown.
Verify the alert is dismissible and persists until addressed.

title: Agenda Management - Create, Edit, Delete Events
description: Verify users can create, update, and delete appointments and tasks in the agenda with synchronization to Google Calendar.

steps.description: Navigate to the agenda page.
Create a new appointment with valid details.
Verify appointment appears on agenda and Google Calendar.
Edit the appointment's date and description.
Verify updated appointment is reflected in agenda and synced calendar.
Delete the appointment.
Verify appointment is removed from agenda and synced calendar.

title: Task and Notification Management - Handling Notifications
description: Ensure tasks and system notifications are listed, can be marked as read/unread, and task statuses can be updated correctly.

steps.description: Navigate to the tasks and notifications pages.
Verify tasks and notifications are populated accurately.
Mark a notification as read.
Confirm notification status is updated and persists.
Update a task status from pending to completed.
Confirm task status reflects the change.

title: SDR Agent Module - Lead Qualification and Scheduling
description: Validate the full lead qualification process, funnel stages management, and automatic scheduling through the SDR agent module.

steps.description: Navigate to the SDR agent module.
Create a new lead and assign to the funnel.
Verify lead appears correctly in funnel with correct stage.
Use the SDR agent to qualify the lead via chat interaction.
Verify lead stage updates accordingly.
Schedule an appointment automatically for the qualified lead.
Confirm appointment is created and appears in agenda.

title: Chat and Support Integration - Chatwoot Support Availability
description: Ensure chat with AI agent operates smoothly and Chatwoot support integration delivers messages correctly with SLA compliance.

steps.description: Open the chat interface and initiate conversation with AI agent.
Verify AI responds promptly with relevant answers.
Request support via chat to escalate to Chatwoot.
Verify Chatwoot support agent receives the request and replies.
Validate response times are within the SLA according to user plan.

title: User Profile Management - Update Data and Preferences
description: Verify that users can update their profile information, switch themes, and modify preferences and plan subscriptions.

steps.description: Navigate to the user profile page.
Update profile fields such as name, email, and preferences.
Change theme between available options.
Change subscription plan.
Verify that all updates persist correctly and UI reflects changes.

title: Reports Module - Search, Filter and Export Data
description: Verify report generation with optimized searching, filtering functions and exporting reports in CSV and PDF formats according to user plan.

steps.description: Navigate to the reports page.
Perform searches using various filters and criteria.
Verify report data matches filters applied and loads efficiently.
Export reports in CSV format.
Verify generated CSV file contains correct and complete data.
Export reports in PDF format where permitted by plan.
Verify generated PDF report integrity and readability.

title: Payment Flow and Plan Upgrade via Stripe Integration
description: Validate secure payment processing, plan upgrades, and successful integration with Stripe including error handling for failed payments.

steps.description: Navigate to the payment or subscription upgrade page.
Select a higher-tier plan and proceed to checkout.
Enter valid payment details and confirm payment.
Verify payment is processed successfully via Stripe.
Verify the user subscription plan is updated accordingly in the system.
Attempt payment with invalid or expired card details.
Verify payment failure is handled gracefully with informative error message.

title: PWA Performance and Security - Load and Data Sanitization
description: Ensure the Progressive Web App loads quickly, remains responsive and applies data sanitization preventing injection and security vulnerabilities.

steps.description: Load the application on various supported devices and browsers.
Verify app loads under 3 seconds on average connection.
Simulate injection attempts via user input fields.
Verify all inputs are sanitized and no malicious scripts execute.
Confirm monitoring logs show no security exceptions or performance regressions.

title: LGPD Compliance - User Data Handling and Consent
description: Verify that user data is handled according to LGPD requirements including consent management, data access and deletion upon request.

steps.description: Register a new user and verify consent request is shown before data collection.
Confirm user consent is recorded.
Request user data export from profile settings.
Verify user receives a complete data export file.
Request account deletion via profile settings.
Verify user data is deleted in compliance with required timelines and confirmation is sent.

title: Support SLA Verification per Plan
description: Verify that support response times meet defined SLAs: 2 hours maximum for Business plan and 1 hour maximum for Premium plan.

steps.description: Log a support request using a Business plan account.
Ensure first support response is received within 2 hours.
Log a separate support request using a Premium plan account.
Ensure first support response is received within 1 hour.
Verify escalation and priority support options are honored according to plan.
